document_data.name: Place of the Unicorn
document_data.mainbody: The '''Place of the Unicorn''' was a sacred grove where an [[avatar]] of [[Lurue]] was known to occasionally appear.<ref name="PaP-p39" >
document_data.Geography: The grove was located in the [[Lost Hills]], northeast of [[Leilon]] on the [[Sword Coast North]]. The grove would only appear at night.
document_data.Description: The grove was formed by a stand of trees surrounding a bluegrass meadow. The leaves of the trees were brilliant blue in color.These trees may be [[blueleaf]]s.
document_data.Activities: Anyone resting within the Place of the Unicorn was magically cured of all [[disease]]s, [[curse]]s, [[poison]]s, and insanity. [[Unicorn]]s visiting the grove were healed of any physical trauma. Anyone lacking faith, or wavering in their faith, would actually see Lurue, which often reshaped their life.
document_data.History: [[Sage]]s and [[wizard]]s along the [[Sword Coast]] believed that the Place of the Unicorn existed within another dimension and was only accessible via a ''[[moongate]]''.
